segments.text: Good afternoon , Ma ’ am , My name is Mike and I am selling subscriptions to all sorts of periodicals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you , I am not interested .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please ma ’ am , if you could spare five minutes of your time , I am sure we could find something that interests you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish I could , but I have to walk the dog and finish cooking so if you would excuse me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a great variety of magazines all about cooking ! This one for example , is a bi monthly publication with recipes from all over the world !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , that would be kind of useful , do you have any other cooking magazines ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure do ! This one is a quarterly publication , but each issue has over 200 color pages of recipes and also many home decorating ideas !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , this is nice ! Ok , sign me up for both publications .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mentioned you have a dog , most pet owners sign up for this weekly newsletter that has information on dog care , pet shops and even pet sitters !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is exactly what I needed ! What else do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2
